home.heroTitle: Safe vehicle transaction in one flow

dealCards.dealCardsSectionTitle: Choose how you want to continue

sell.title: I want to sell
sell.text: Create the deal, set price and terms, sign it. Payment from the buyer is confirmed in real time in the app. Ownership transfer opens automatically at Transportstyrelsen and the confirmation appears in Klargo.

buy.title: I want to buy
buy.text: Connect via registration number or QR. Pay safely and get real-time confirmation. Choose financing or pay directly via bank transfer. Insurance and price directly in the app. Ownership transfer opens automatically at Transportstyrelsen and the confirmation appears in Klargo.

home.confirmationText: Real-time confirmation means that the payment is registered and acknowledged in the app. Payout to bank account normally takes 1â€“2 banking days.

serviceCards.title: Create and sign contract
serviceCards.text: Shared terms and price, digitally signed.

serviceCards.title: Pay safely
serviceCards.text: Real-time confirmation in the app. Payout within 1â€“2 banking days.

serviceCards.title: Complete ownership transfer
serviceCards.text: Transportstyrelsen opens automatically. Sign with BankID.

serviceCards.title: Choose insurance
serviceCards.text: Multiple options with instant confirmation in the app.

whyChooseKlargo.title: All-in-one flow
whyChooseKlargo.text: Both seller and buyer see the same thing and follow the same process.

whyChooseKlargo.title: Secure payment
whyChooseKlargo.text: Money is handled safely until the deal is complete. Real-time confirmation.

whyChooseKlargo.title: Correct order
whyChooseKlargo.text: Guidance that mirrors the ownership transfer process at Transportstyrelsen.

whyChooseKlargo.title: Documents in place
whyChooseKlargo.text: Contracts, receipts, and insurance documents are saved.

home.pricingText: Applies to all vehicle types in Klargo.

faqItems.title: How fast will I get the money?
faqItems.content: You see the payment confirmed in real-time in the app. Payout to your account usually occurs within 1â€“2 banking days.

faqItems.title: How does the ownership transfer work?
faqItems.content: The seller completes the ownership transfer at Transportstyrelsen. Klargo opens the service automatically and fills in your details. You sign with BankID and see the confirmation in the app.

faqItems.title: Can I choose financing as a buyer?
faqItems.content: Yes. You can apply in the app and get a quick response via our partners. You can also pay directly via bank transfer.

faqItems.title: If the vehicle has a loan, can we complete the purchase?
faqItems.content: Yes. We guide how it is handled in the transaction and document the agreement.

faqItems.title: Does the insurance apply immediately?
faqItems.content: Yes. You choose the insurance start in the flow and get confirmation in the app.

faqItems.title: How much does it cost?
faqItems.content: Always 149 SEK per transaction regardless of the vehicle price.

stepCards.title: Vehicle ownership transfer step by step
stepCards.description: Correct order and terminology according to Transportstyrelsen.

stepCards.title: Buying and selling used vehicles
stepCards.description: Fraud protection, odometer readings, and documentation.

stepCards.title: Financing and insurance
stepCards.description: How car loans and insurance work in practice.

home.loanDescription: Financing is offered via partners. Individual assessment and terms apply. Effective interest depends on credit profile and loan duration.
loanExampleList: Exact terms shown in the app before applying
home.partnersSectionSubtitle: Klargo uses established payment, data, and insurance partners. Exact offers may vary per deal.

seller.headerTitle: What Do You Want To Sell Today?
seller.startSaleSubtitle: Enter the registration number of the car you want to sell
seller.askBuyer: Ask the buyer to scan the QR code or enter the registration number in their app to connect to the sale.
seller.sellCarForTitle: What do you want to sell the car for?

deliveryRisk.title: Delivery and risk
deliveryRisk.description: The risk passes to the buyer when the vehicle is taken into possession. This means that the buyer is responsible for the vehicle from the time of handover.

conditionDefects.title: Condition and defects
conditionDefects.line1: The vehicle is sold in its existing condition.
conditionDefects.line2: Defects can also be claimed in its existing condition if the seller has provided incorrect information, omitted essential information, or if the vehicle is significantly worse than could reasonably be expected.
conditionDefects.line3: Notify defects without undue delay and no later than two years from delivery.

debts.title: Debts
debts.subtitle: Choose how you want to handle any debts.

options.seller: Debts exist. The seller pays before delivery.
options.buyer: Debts exist. The buyer pays and deducts from the price.

loan.title: Loan or lien
loan.description: If a lien or credit is not settled upon delivery, the buyer may stop enforcement or cancel the purchase.

options.seller: Loan or lien exists. The seller settles before delivery.
options.buyer: Loan exists, settled upon delivery. The buyer pays net to the bank and the rest to the seller.

ownership.title: Right of ownership and documents
ownership.description1: The right of ownership remains with the seller until full payment has been received.
ownership.description2: Upon delivery, the seller hands over the documents that remain, such as registration certificate part 2 and service records.
ownership.description3: The seller certifies that the vehicle is not subject to a driving ban upon delivery.

transportAgency.title: The Swedish Transport Agency
transportAgency.description1: The parties undertake to carry out the change of ownership without delay in the Swedish Transport Agency's app or e-service upon delivery.
transportAgency.description2: This agreement proves the agreement. The registration takes place at the Swedish Transport Agency.
